    • 方法详细资料

      • computeHeaderOffset

        public abstract int computeHeaderOffset(int firstVisiblePosition,
                                        SectionData sd,
                                        LayoutState state)
        Compute the offset for side aligned headers. If the height of the non-visible area of the section is taller than the header, then the header should be offscreen, in that case return any +ve number.
        参数:
        firstVisiblePosition - Position of first visible item in section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        -ve number giving the distance the header should be offset before the anchor view. A +ve number indicates the header is offscreen.

      • fillToEnd

        public abstract int fillToEnd(int leadingEdge,
                              int markerLine,
                              int anchorPosition,
                              SectionData sd,
                              LayoutState state)
        Fill section content towards the end.
        参数:
        leadingEdge - Line to fill up to. Content will not be wholly beyond this line.
        markerLine - Start of the section content area.
        anchorPosition - Adapter position for the first content item in the section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        Line to which content has been filled.

      • fillToStart

        public abstract int fillToStart(int leadingEdge,
                                int markerLine,
                                int anchorPosition,
                                SectionData sd,
                                LayoutState state)

      • findFirstCompletelyVisibleItemPosition

        public int findFirstCompletelyVisibleItemPosition(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Find the position of the first completely visible item of this section.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        返回:
        Position of first completely visible item.

      • findFirstVisibleItemPosition

        public int findFirstVisibleItemPosition(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Find the position of the first visible item of the section.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        返回:
        Position of first visible item.

      • findLastCompletelyVisibleItemPosition

        public int findLastCompletelyVisibleItemPosition(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Find the position of the first visible item of this section.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        返回:
        Position of first visible item.

      • findLastVisibleItemPosition

        public int findLastVisibleItemPosition(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Find the position of the first visible item of the section.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        返回:
        Position of first visible item.

      • finishFillToEnd

        public abstract int finishFillToEnd(int leadingEdge,
                                    android.view.View anchor,
                                    SectionData sd,
                                    LayoutState state)
        Finish filling an already partially filled section.
        参数:
        leadingEdge - Line to fill up to. Content will not be wholly beyond this line.
        anchor - Last attached content item in this section.
        sd - Section data.
        state - Layout state.
        返回:
        Line to which content has been filled.

      • finishFillToStart

        public abstract int finishFillToStart(int leadingEdge,
                                      android.view.View anchor,
                                      SectionData sd,
                                      LayoutState state)

      • generateLayoutParams

        public StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams generateLayoutParams(StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams params)

        public StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams generateLayoutParams(android.content.Context c,
                                                             android.util.AttributeSet attrs)

      • getAnchorPosition

        public int getAnchorPosition(LayoutState state,
                             SectionData params,
                             int position)

      • getFirstCompletelyVisibleView

        public android.view.View getFirstCompletelyVisibleView(int sectionFirstPosition,
                                                       boolean skipHeader)
        Locate the first view in this section that is completely visible. Will skip headers unless they are the only one visible.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        skipHeader - Do not include the section header if it has one.
        返回:
        First completely visible item or null.

      • getFirstVisibleView

        public android.view.View getFirstVisibleView(int sectionFirstPosition,
                                             boolean skipHeader)
        Locate the visible view which has the earliest adapter position. Will skip headers unless they are the only one visible.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - Position of first position of section..
        skipHeader - Do not include the section header if it has one.
        返回:
        View.

      • getHighestEdge

        public int getHighestEdge(int sectionFirstPosition,
                          int firstIndex,
                          int defaultEdge)
        Find the highest displayed edge of the section. If there is no member found then return the default edge instead.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - Section id, position of first item in the section.
        firstIndex - Child index to start looking from.
        defaultEdge - Default value.
        返回:
        Top (attached) edge of the section.

      • getLastCompletelyVisibleView

        public android.view.View getLastCompletelyVisibleView(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Locate the last view in this section that is completely visible. Will skip headers unless they are the only one visible.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - First position of section being queried.
        返回:
        Last completely visible item or null.

      • getLastVisibleView

        public android.view.View getLastVisibleView(int sectionFirstPosition)
        Locate the visible view which has the latest adapter position.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - Section id.
        返回:
        View.

      • getLowestEdge

        public int getLowestEdge(int sectionFirstPosition,
                         int lastIndex,
                         int defaultEdge)
        Find the lowest displayed edge of the section. If there is no member found then return the default edge instead.
        参数:
        sectionFirstPosition - Section id, position of first item in the section.
        lastIndex - Index to start looking from. Usually the index of the last attached view in this section.
        defaultEdge - Default value.
        返回:
        Lowest (attached) edge of the section.

      • howManyMissingAbove

        public int howManyMissingAbove(int firstPosition,
                               android.util.SparseArray<java.lang.Boolean> positionsOffscreen)
